item.title: Event Sourcing: Turning Your App into a Time Machine
item.description: Data types in C# define the type of data that a variable can store. Understanding and using the correct data types are crucial for writing efficient and bug-free code. This guide will walk you through the basic and advanced data types in C#, providing examples to illustrate their usage.
